sentences.sContent: Other organizations have joined the confederation for mutual benefit.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other organizations have joined the confederation for mutual benefit.
sentences.sCn: 其他组织为了共同的利益也加入了这个联盟。

sentences.sContent: You said something about the integration of the resistance movement into the galactic confederation.
sentences.sContent_eng: You said something about the integration of the resistance movement into the galactic confederation.
sentences.sCn: 你说过一些有关将抵抗运动整合进入银河联盟。

sentences.sContent: Pedro Montes, leader of the main union confederation, opposed Mr Morales's plan for a referendum, saying it would set people against each other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pedro Montes, leader of the main union confederation, opposed Mr Morales's plan for a referendum, saying it would set people against each other.
sentences.sCn: 主要工会联盟的领导者佩德罗·蒙特斯，反对莫拉莱斯关于公民投票的计划。他说，公民投票将让人们相互反目。

phrases.pCn: 十三州邦联宪法（美国第一部宪法）

remMethod.val: con + feder(联盟) + ation(状态) → 联盟

words.tran: 使联盟；使联合；同伙；帮凶

trans.tranOther: a group of people, political parties, or organizations that have united for political purposes or trade
